text: As a graduate of Computer Engineering, I am captivated by the field of computer technology and I am striving to become a significant contributor to the progress of technology.

Raised as an only child to a single, full-time working mother, life's challenges provided me with the opportunity to develop an objective perspective of the world, becoming the foundation for my creative problem solving skills.

Throughout my life I have been able to build a relationship with nature and technology which transformed into aspirations to have a career to create technological solutions while building strong ethics, with a focus on the preservation of the environment and the optimization of the lives of those that are within my sphere of influence.

With a strong desire to develop solutions that can enhance and improve our relationship with technology and the world, I am currently looking for a full-time position as a software engineer, hardware engineer, firmware engineer, or embedded systems engineer.
